labels.will_inform_you: We’ll email you instructions to reset your password.
labels.check_spam_if_email_not_found: If the email does not arrive soon, check your spam folder. It was sent from no-reply@kidsight.
labels.sign_in_to_your_account: Sign in to your kidsight account.

messages.enter_email_associate_with_account: Don’t worry! It happens. Please enter your email address associated with your account.
messages.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
messages.invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials, please try again with valid credentials.
